attributes.action: accept an invitation to join me for a pint in my Public House to see the damage his government has caused to the Great British pub.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned invite the Prime Minister to attend the Bird In Hand, 38 High Street, Measham, Derbys DE12 7HZ for a beautiful British pint to see first hand the damage his Government has caused to the Great British public house.

It would be an ideal opportunity for the Prime Minister to get out of his stuffy suit, disgard his overbearing advisers and have a proper traditional conversation / discussion in an environment where people have held similar topical debate for centuries.

Naturally, we would expect the Prime Minister to buy a "round" as is custom in a Great British pub!

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
